name: css-starter
description: CSS boilerplate for starting new web projects
author: filip@fmal.me

scripts.css:postIe: autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions, ie 8' < dist/css/main-ie.css | cleancss --source-map --skip-import --compatibility 'ie8' -o dist/css/main-ie.min.css
scripts.postcss:build: npm run css:post -s && npm run css:postIe -s
scripts.build: npm run html:build -s && npm run css:build -s
scripts.watch: parallelshell 'npm run css:watch -s' 'npm run html:watch -s' 'npm run browserSync'
